text: Alloh taolo ƣanimathoi farovonero ʙa sumo va'da dod, ki [dar ojanda] ʙa onho dast xohed joft; pas, in [piruzi va ƣanimathoi Xajʙar]-ro ʙaroi sumo zudtar faroham soxt va dasti [taaddi va tacovuzi] dusmanro az sumo kutoh namud, to ʙaroi mu'minon nisonai [az lutfi ilohi] ʙosad va sumoro ʙa rohi rost hidojat kunad
